entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Wynyard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wynyard 12:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -18.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -23.3°C
Wind: SE 35 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow at times early in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
